circumstances: Arthur McCarthy, an experienced sea kayaker despite his age, was last known to be preparing for a solo kayaking trip along the rugged coastline near Carmelite Street, Banff, AB45 1GF. Rachel, unable to reach him, contacted local authorities, emphasizing the potential for a sea kayaking accident, especially given the unpredictable tides and currents along that stretch of coast.
